pages.text: Icy Slippers are footwear that offer low levels of protection, can be dyed and $(item)enchanted$().$(br)They will freeze any $(item)Water$() they come in contact with, allowing the wearer to effectively walk on water.$(p)Wearing the slippers underwater is a very bad idea, as it might get the wearer trapped in an ice prison.

pages.title: Other Properties
pages.text: Icy Slippers will also turn $(item)Lava$() into $(item)Obsidian$() when walked over, but it will significantly damage the Icy Slippers and there's still a risk of being set on fire.$(p)Icy Slippers will turn invisible when the player is invisible, and can be repaired by crafting them with four $(l:resources/impregnated_leather)Impregnated Leather$(/l) or by combining them with $(item)Leather$() into an $(item)Anvil$().

Icy Slippers are footwear that offer low levels of protection, can be $(item)enchanted$() but not dyed.$(br)Once every 30 minutes, an $(l:kettle/infusion_intro#light_infusion)Infused$(/l) player can $(l:artifacts/chants/no_place_like_home)Chant$() 'There's no place like home' to get teleported back to their $(item)Spawn Point$().$(br)The Chant will consume 40% of the Infusion Power, 60% if the Spawn Point is across dimensions.

pages.title: Waystone Transposition
pages.text: An alternative to the Spawn Point is to drop a $(l:artifacts/misc/bound_waystone)Bound Waystone$(/l) near themselves and use the Chant to teleport to the location of the Bound Waystone, which will be consumed.$(p)The ability saves the need to draw circles for the $(l:circle_magic/transposition/to_waystone)Rite of Transposition$(/l) and costs 20% of the Infusion Power, 40% if the target location is cross-dimensional.

pages.title: Other Properties
pages.text: Ruby Slippers will turn invisible when the player is invisible, and can be repaired by crafting them with four $(l:resources/impregnated_leather)Impregnated Leather$(/l) or by combining them with $(item)Leather$() into an $(item)Anvil$().
